snippet: Steven A. Cohen, the billionaire founder of SAC Capital Advisors and owner of a rich trove of art, is a regular at Art Basel Miami Beach. But he’s absent this year.
abstract: Opening of Art Basel Miami Beach is marked by the absence of Steven A Cohen, billionaire and leading contemporary art collector who many speculate has been targeted as part of a federal investigation into insider trading at his hedge fund SAC Capital Advisers.
lead_paragraph: Steven A. Cohen, the billionaire founder of SAC Capital Advisors and owner of a rich trove of art, is a regular at Art Basel Miami Beach. But he’s absent this year.

headline.seo: Steven A. Cohen Is Absent at Art Basel Miami Beach
headline.main: A Big Art Lover, and Moneyman, Is Missing at the Fair
